T02D1706:63b-1: a'ary'a pi th'i shva ri s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02D1706:63b-3: 'phags ma gnas kyi dbang phyug ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D1706:63b-4: 'phags ma gnas kyi dbang phyug ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1706:63b-5: de nas gsang pa bdag gis bshad //
T02D1706:63b-6: gsang ba'i de nyid man ngag ste //
T02D1706:63b-7: cho ga snga dro langs nas ni //
T02D1706:63b-8: snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis su //
T02D1706:63b-9: yid ni g-yo ba med bya ste //
T02D1706:63b-10: sems can thams cad gnod bya'o //
T02D1706:63b-11: bdud rtsi lnga ni blangs nas su //
T02D1706:63b-12: thod par rtog med sems kyis bzhag / rlung dang me yi steng du ni //
T02D1706:63b-13: dag dang khol dang tshos par bya //
T02D1706:63b-15: byang chub yan lag rab tu sbyin //
T02D1706:63b-17: rab brtan rdo rje skyil krung bcas //
T02D1706:63b-18: ting 'dzin phyag rgya yang dag bya //
T02D1706:63b-19: khams gsum stong pa nyid du blta //
T02D1706:63b-21: nye bar rnyed pa gang yang med //
T02D1706:63b-22: dri za'i grong khyer rnam pa 'dra //
T02D1706:63b-24: thugs ka'i nam mkha'i dbus gnas par //
T02D1706:63b-25: ye shes zla ba dri med bya //
T02D1706:63b-26: dbus su tam yig bsam mi khyab //
T02D1706:63b-28: phyogs bcur gnas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1706:63b-29: sgrol ma'i gzugs rnams rnam bsgom bya //
T02D1706:63b-30: de rnams spyan drangs byin gyis brlab //
T02D1706:64a-2: de ni sems can thams cad la //
T02D1706:64a-3: ye shes 'od zer rnam dag bya //
T02D1706:64a-4: sangs rgyas de nyid rab gnas bya //
T02D1706:64a-5: byang chub snying po mchis kyi bar //
T02D1706:64a-6: myur du sangs rgyas sgrol ma can //
T02D1706:64a-7: nam mkha' yi ni mdun du blta //
T02D1706:64a-8: ye shes mchod pa sna tshogs pa ;
T02D1706:64a-9: / ye shes las ni skyes pas bya //
T02D1706:64a-10: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro //
T02D1706:64a-11: sems can thams cad don byas te //
T02D1706:64a-12: cho ga gsum gyi sbas pa'i sdig / bla ma'i mdun du rab tu bshags //
T02D1706:64a-13: sdig pa thams cad grol bdag nyid //
T02D1706:64a-14: myur du sangs rgyas thob pa'o //
T02D1706:64a-15: bdag nyid sgrol ma'i rnam par bya //
T02D1706:64a-16: 'gro kun de bzhin sgrol ma ru //
T02D1706:64a-17: bltas nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni //
T02D1706:64a-18: byin brlabs sa bon de rab bzhugs //
T02D1706:64a-19: chos rnams rnam rtog bral ba dang //
T02D1706:64a-20: rang bzhin med cing bdag med rnams //
T02D1706:64a-21: dbyer med rnal 'byor pas gzigs bya //
T02D1706:64a-22: sngags 'di dag ni brjod par bya //
T02D1706:64a-23: aom sv'a bh'a wa shuddha:sarba dharm'a: sv'a bh'a wa shuddhonyaham /
T02D1706:64a-24: aom sv'a bh'a wa sh'u n+ya t'a sarba dharm'a sv'a bh'a wa shuddhonyaham /
T02D1706:64a-25: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma konyaham /
T02D1706:64a-26: nam mkha'i khams zla dbus gnas par //
T02D1706:64a-27: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes mchog / de yi lte ba'i dbus na ni //
T02D1706:64a-28: zla bar ham yig ye shes so //
T02D1706:64a-29: rdo rje'i rlung dang me dang chu //
T02D1706:64a-30: de nas sa yi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1706:64a-31: ri rab dang ni bhr'um las byung //
T02D1706:64a-32: gzhal yas khang ni rnam par blta //
T02D1706:64a-33: de yi dbus su padmar gnas //
T02D1706:64a-36: rnam pa sna tshogs yid 'phrog pa'i //
T02D1706:64a-38: rtsibs ni bcu gnyis shin tu mdzes //
T02D1706:64a-39: thig ni lnga dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1706:64a-40: de yi sgo ni bzhi pa la //
T02D1706:64a-41: lha yi rta babs rnam bzhi'o //
T02D1706:64a-42: me long la sogs rnams kyis brgyan //
T02D1706:64a-43: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa'o //
T02D1706:64a-45: phyogs skyong mgon po rnams spyan drangs //
T02D1706:64a-46: byang sems de bzhin gshegs par rnams //
T02D1706:64a-47: ye shes rlung gis dgug par bya //
T02D1706:64a-48: rnal 'byor ma kun dga' byed rnams //
T02D1706:64a-49: kun mkhyen til gyi gang bu rnams //
T02D1706:64a-50: zla bar rab tu zhugs par bsgoms //
T02D1706:64b-0: @64b de gyur pa las bdag nyid ni //
T02D1706:64b-1: lha mo sgrol mar bsgom par bya //
T02D1706:64b-2: sku mdog dmar la zhal bzhi pa //
T02D1706:64b-3: phyag ni brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1706:64b-4: nyi ma 'char ka brgya yi ngang //
T02D1706:64b-5: dang po'i zhal ni dran par bya //
T02D1706:64b-6: dri med nam mkha'i rang bzhin sngo //
T02D1706:64b-7: g-yas kyi zhal ni dran par bya //
T02D1706:64b-8: sha ka sa la sha bzhin ljang //
T02D1706:64b-9: g-yas kyi zhal ni yid dga' bas //
T02D1706:64b-10: de ltar dkon mchog gsum drag po //
T02D1706:64b-12: cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa po //
T02D1706:64b-13: mi sdug de nas bsgom par bya //
T02D1706:64b-14: ser po zhi ba steng gi zhal //
T02D1706:64b-15: rgyan kun gyis ni brgyan pa'o //
T02D1706:64b-16: thod pa'i phreng bas dbu brgyan pa'o //
T02D1706:64b-17: ye shes lnga ni nye bar mdzes //
T02D1706:64b-18: de ltar de ni gzi brjid che //
T02D1706:64b-19: zhal bzhi par ni bsam gtan bya //
T02D1706:64b-20: thod pa rdo rje ral gri dang //
T02D1706:64b-21: da ma ru g-yas phyag na bsnams //
T02D1706:64b-22: yid bzhin nor bu kha tv'am ga / dril bu de bzhin autpala dmar //
T02D1706:64b-23: de yi g-yon par bsgom par bya //
T02D1706:64b-24: de yi brla la yod pa ni //
T02D1706:64b-25: stag gi sham thabs gyon pa'o //
T02D1706:64b-26: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar byed pa //
T02D1706:64b-27: sna tshogs padma zla dbus gnas //
T02D1706:64b-28: snying rje'i khro ba 'jigs byed ma //
T02D1706:64b-29: spyan gsum dmar po bgrad pa'o //
T02D1706:64b-30: drag po g-yon phyogs lta bar byed //
T02D1706:64b-31: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la rtag gnas //
T02D1706:64b-32: gnas rnams kyang ni dgug pa'i mchod //
T02D1706:64b-33: rnal 'byor ma tshogs dbus gnas par //
T02D1706:64b-34: bde ba thams cad rab sbyin pa'o //
T02D1706:64b-35: p'u dza ao aa go ra de ma //
T02D1706:64b-36: ka ao tri ko ka la hi //
T02D1706:64b-37: pre gri soo su na si ma ku //
T02D1706:64b-38: de ltar yi ge nyi shu bzhi //
T02D1706:64b-40: lus la cho ga'i cho ga yis //
T02D1706:64b-42: mtshog kha spyi bo rna ba g-yas //
T02D1706:64b-43: ltag pa g-yon gyi rna ba dag / smin mtshams dang ni spyan dang ni //
T02D1706:64b-44: dpung pa'i rtsa gnyis de bzhin no //
T02D1706:64b-45: mchan khung gnyis dang nu ma gnyis //
T02D1706:64b-46: lte ba'i sna yi rtse mo dang //
T02D1706:64b-47: kha dang mgul la go cha bya //
T02D1706:64b-48: snying ga dang ni mdoms dang ni //
T02D1706:64b-49: gsang gnas bshang lam de bzhin brla //
T02D1706:64b-50: pus mo go rims ji bzhin no //
T02D1706:64b-51: dang po su ra te shva ri ti //
T02D1706:64b-52: gnyis par su ra ta sonta ri //
T02D1706:64b-53: gsum ba su ra ta tsandra dang //
T02D1706:64b-54: bzhi pa su ra ta ma li ni //
T02D1706:65a-2: drug pa su ra ta ka mi ni //
T02D1706:65a-3: bdun pa su rat au gra dang //
T02D1706:65a-4: brgyad pa su rat autta ma //
T02D1706:65a-5: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas song bsgom //
T02D1706:65a-6: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab tu gyur //
T02D1706:65a-7: dkar dang ljang dang sngo ba dang //
T02D1706:65a-8: bzhi pa sku mdog ser po dang //
T02D1706:65a-9: ser dang dkar dang dmar ba dang //
T02D1706:65a-10: sku mdog sngon po brgyad pa'o //
T02D1706:65a-11: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
T02D1706:65a-12: dril bu da ma rus brgyan pa'o //
T02D1706:65a-13: thod pa'i phreng bas dbu brgyan pa'o //
T02D1706:65a-14: rgyan ni thams cad kyis brgyan pa //
T02D1706:65a-15: rin chen ye shes steng dbus brgyan //
T02D1706:65a-17: shi khi bhi ma shi khand'i //
T02D1706:65a-18: ke r'a l'i de bzhin dza ti li //
T02D1706:65a-19: au ti dzi ta de bzhin tsandi //
T02D1706:65a-20: moondi bi ka do autka ti //
T02D1706:65a-21: ki ri di nar te ki dang ngo //
T02D1706:65a-22: zhing dang nye zhing tshan do ha //
T02D1706:65a-23: de bzhin nye ba'i tshan do ha //
T02D1706:65a-25: gnas ni de rnams gnas pa yi //
T02D1706:65a-26: lha mo bcu gnyis bsgom par bya //
T02D1706:65a-27: phyed dmar phyed ni ljang ba rnams //
T02D1706:65a-28: thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa'o //
T02D1706:65a-29: sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams //
T02D1706:65a-30: skra grol ba dang khro gnyer can //
T02D1706:65a-31: rtag pa'i mchog ni dbu rgyan rnams //
T02D1706:65a-32: thod pa kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1706:65a-34: kam pu tsi dang pukka s'e //
T02D1706:65a-35: dombi de bzhin ma tam gi / bzhi ni sna tshogs mdog rnams so //
T02D1706:65a-36: sgo srung khro gnyer chen mo'o //
T02D1706:65a-37: mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal mnga' ba //
T02D1706:65a-38: g-yon bskum g-yas brkyang nges par gnas //
T02D1706:65a-39: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa //
T02D1706:65a-40: mi bskyod pa yi dam tshig ste //
T02D1706:65a-41: dbu rgyan steng du rgyan rnams so //
T02D1706:65a-42: thod pa kha tv'am gi 'dzin pa //
T02D1706:65a-43: phyag mtshan gri gug mgo bo bsnams //
T02D1706:65a-44: rgyan rnams kun gyis lus brgyan pa //
T02D1706:65a-45: bdud bzhi'i steng du yang dag gnas //
T02D1706:65a-46: thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa rnams //
T02D1706:65a-47: dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod rnams //
T02D1706:65a-48: dad sogs dbang po rnam par dag / snying rje ldan pa bsgom par bya //
T02D1706:65a-49: thams cad gcer pu 'dzin pa rnams //
T02D1706:65a-50: snying rje'i dga' ma mdzes pa rnams //
T02D1706:65a-51: lte ba'i dbus su yang dag gnas //
T02D1706:65a-52: lha mo sgrol ma rnam par bsgom //
T02D1706:65a-53: pur ti shva ra'i sde rnams ni //
T02D1706:65a-54: rim dang rim min bskor ba'o //
T02D1706:65b-0: 'khor lo @65b rtsibs chen bcu gnyis la //
T02D1706:65b-1: shi khi la sogs nor bur bar //
T02D1706:65b-2: rim dang rim pa min pa'o //
T02D1706:65b-3: 'gro ba'i bdag mo rnam par dgod //
T02D1706:65b-4: rkang pa bkug dang brkyang ba dang //
T02D1706:65b-5: yang ni brkyang dang dgug pa'i bar //
T02D1706:65b-6: kam pu tsi sogs sgo rnams su //
T02D1706:65b-7: g-yon du bskor bar rnam par dgod//
T02D1706:65b-8: de ltar rdzogs pa'i sgrub pa ni //
T02D1706:65b-10: de nas cho ga rab tu phye //
T02D1706:65b-11: rigs lnga po ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1706:65b-12: spyi bor brum yig dkar po ste //
T02D1706:65b-13: mgrin pa'i hr'i: ni nyi ma'i mdog / brum yig nag po thugs ka ru //
T02D1706:65b-14: aa ni lte bar gser gyi mdog / gsang ba'i gnas su kham ljang gu //
T02D1706:65b-15: bsgoms shig rnam pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1706:65b-16: 'khor pad rdo rje rin chen mchog / sna tshogs rdo rje 'di rnams gnas //
T02D1706:65b-17: rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad la //
T02D1706:65b-18: cho ga des ni cho ga bya //
T02D1706:65b-19: thugs ka'i sa bon 'od lcags kyus //
T02D1706:65b-20: sangs rgyas ye shes 'khor lor dgug / ba spu'i sgo rnams padma gnas //
T02D1706:65b-21: mchod pa'i lha mo rang las sprul //
T02D1706:65b-22: dad pa mchog gis yang dag mchod //
T02D1706:65b-23: yang ni rang la gzhug par bya //
T02D1706:65b-24: de nas dbang bskur gsol ba gdab //
T02D1706:65b-25: bde gshegs rnams ni dngos grub ster //
T02D1706:65b-26: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1706:65b-27: de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar //
T02D1706:65b-28: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02D1706:65b-29: de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o //
T02D1706:65b-30: aom sarba tishth'a aa bhi she ka sa ma ya hri ye h'um /
T02D1706:65b-31: aom sarba tishth'a aa bhi she ka ta shodhi a'atma
T02D1706:65b-32: ki sa ra sa ra pra sa ra pra sa
T02D1706:65b-33: ra / sarba buddha aa dhishth'i te sv'a h'a /
T02D1706:65b-34: ma lus sems can thams cad rnams //
T02D1706:65b-35: sgrol ma'i gzugs su nges lta bar //
T02D1706:65b-36: sgom sbyor gyis ni sgom gyis shig / bsgom pa sgom min skad cig tsam //
T02D1706:65b-37: gnas kyi man ngag rim gyis dang //
T02D1706:65b-38: bla ma'i rnal 'byor ma rim gyis //
T02D1706:65b-39: man ngag dam tshig rnyed pa ste //
T02D1706:65b-40: bla ma'i zhabs kyi mchog sbyin gyis //
T02D1706:65b-41: ye shes rtog pa bsgom bdag nyid //
T02D1706:65b-42: ye shes rtog pa sgom gyis shig / rtog pa bral ba med pa ni //
T02D1706:65b-43: ye shes ma yin rtog pa min //
T02D1706:65b-44: chos kyi bdag nyid mnyam pa nyid //
T02D1706:65b-45: rang gzhan med cing yi ge med //
T02D1706:65b-46: sku mdog 'das dang rnam pa med //
T02D1706:65b-47: ring po ma yin zlum po min /
T02D1706:66a-0: @66a * // de nyid 'byung po thams cad rnams //
T02D1706:66a-1: rnal 'byor ye shes yid med pa //
T02D1706:66a-2: de ni de nyid bzlas pa yis //
T02D1706:66a-4: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re h'um phad /
T02D1706:66a-5: de ltar dam tshig sngags yin te //
T02D1706:66a-6: bcom ldan 'das mas rab tu bshad //
T02D1706:66a-7: dang po aom dang de nas ming //
T02D1706:66a-8: h'um phad yi ge yang dag ldan //
T02D1706:66a-9: zlos shig lha mo rnams kyi sngags //
T02D1706:66a-10: thams cad la ni mchod pa'o //
T02D1706:66a-11: dza:h'um bam ho: sa rim pa bzhin //
T02D1706:66a-12: sgo rnams la'ang dran par bya //
T02D1706:66a-14: sngar bshad pa yi ming ldan pa //
T02D1706:66a-16: aom tr'am hr'i kham h'um lam mam sam tram dza /
T02D1706:66a-17: phung po khams rnams dag pa'o //
T02D1706:66a-18: aom a'a: h'um lus ngag yid gsum dag pa yi //
T02D1706:66a-19: sngar bshad cho gas bsngags pa yis /
T02D1706:66a-20: cho ga 'bum phrag gcig bzlas bya //
T02D1706:66a-21: sdig pa thams cad rnam dag don //
T02D1706:66a-22: sdug bsngal thams cad zad don du //
T02D1706:66a-23: rnal 'byor pa rnams rtag tu ni //
T02D1706:66a-24: bdud rtsi lnga ni lha bshos te //
T02D1706:66a-25: dus kun rnal 'byor rnams kyi ni //
T02D1706:66a-26: dud 'gro bas da nas mchod par bya //
T02D1706:66a-27: sngags pas ts'a ru'i bsgrub pa bya //
T02D1706:66a-28: rnal 'byor ma ldan bza' bar bya //
T02D1706:66a-29: bza' dang bza' min bza' bar bya //
T02D1706:66a-30: btung dang btung min rtag tu btung //
T02D1706:66a-31: bya dang bya min bya ba'o //
T02D1706:66a-33: sdig pa yis ni mi reg go //
T02D1706:66a-34: mnyam nyid bstan pa'i chos nyid do //
T02D1706:66a-36: gsang ba bla med bla med do //
T02D1706:66a-37: rab snang min pa bshad min bya //
T02D1706:66a-38: skye ba 'di la grub pa thob //
T02D1706:66a-39: srog gcod la sogs spangs pa ste //
T02D1706:66a-40: brdzun dang phra ma mi bya'o //
T02D1706:66a-41: blo ni sems can don du bya //
T02D1706:66a-43: dge ba bcu ni nges par bya //
T02D1706:66a-44: de bzhin tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang //
T02D1706:66a-45: sbyin pa la sogs gtong la dga' //
T02D1706:66a-46: mnyes shing mchog ni sgrub pa'o //
T02D1706:66a-47: gzhan yang rnal 'byor bla med bsgom //
T02D1706:66a-48: ji ltar blo yi rim pa ltar //
T02D1706:66a-50: rigs rim ji ltar bstan bcos so //
T02D1706:66a-51: ri dags thogs pa sna tshogs pa de nyi la //
T02D1706:66a-52: sgrol ma bdag nyid bsgom bya ba //
T02D1706:66a-53: sna tshogs mdog dang zhal bzhi pa //
T02D1706:66b-0: g-yon bskum g-yas @66b brkyang gnas pa ste //
T02D1706:66b-1: dbus kyi zhal ni ljang ga la //
T02D1706:66b-2: g-yas ni ser bar blta bar bya //
T02D1706:66b-3: g-yon gyi zhal ni sngo ba la //
T02D1706:66b-4: steng gi zhal ni dkar ba'o //
T02D1706:66b-5: bsam gyis mi khyab mche ba gtsigs //
T02D1706:66b-6: thod pas dbu la brgyan ba mo //
T02D1706:66b-7: dbu la don yod grub pas brgyan //
T02D1706:66b-8: mi yi rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D1706:66b-9: skra grol mig ni yangs pa mo //
T02D1706:66b-10: spyan gsum dmar mo mdzes ma ste //
T02D1706:66b-11: ral gri rdo rje gsor ba ste //
T02D1706:66b-13: dril bu thugs kar sdigs mdzub mdzad //
T02D1706:66b-14: gri gug mgo bo'i lag pa gzhan //
T02D1706:66b-15: autpala thod pa kha tv'am ga / tshangs pa'i pags pa steng du gnas //
T02D1706:66b-16: khyab 'jug dbang phyug che zhabs dag / mnan pas gdan la 'jigs rung 'gyur //
T02D1706:66b-17: sngar smos rnal 'byor ma tshogs rnams //
T02D1706:66b-18: reg gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa //
T02D1706:66b-19: de rnams thams cad sna tshogs mdog / gcer bu 'jigs pa'i rjes su song //
T02D1706:66b-20: gsang ba zab mo bla med sngags //
T02D1706:66b-21: dbu rgyan dpal rim las byung ba //
T02D1706:66b-22: rnal 'byor ma gnas thams cad la //
T02D1706:66b-23: rim pa yang dag spyod pa mchog / gnas kun bla med mnyam sbyor te //
T02D1706:66b-24: rnal 'byor ma thugs bla na med //
T02D1706:66b-25: lha mo'i las ni thams cad byed //
T02D1706:66b-26: dag pa sdig pa sel bar byed //
T02D1706:66b-27: mnyam gzhag med pa'i sgrub pa yis //
T02D1706:66b-28: rnal 'byor bsgom pa sgom pa ste //
T02D1706:66b-29: sngags pas rtag tu bsam gtan gang //
T02D1706:66b-30: nyon mongs ma lus zad par 'gyur //
T02D1706:66b-31: g-yo dang mi g-yo sa gzhir ro //
T02D1706:66b-32: de yi rnal 'byor che rnams spyod //
T02D1706:66b-33: gnas kyi cho ga grub pa bdag nyid //
T02D1706:66b-34: ji ltar bde bas spyad par bya //
T02D1706:66b-41: go cha'i go cha 'dir shes bya //
T02D1706:66b-42: rim pa'i rjes su rim pa ni //
T02D1706:66b-43: bdag nyid yi dam lha grub bdag /'gro ba ma lus di ltar blta //
T02D1706:66b-44: srid pa'i dba' rlabs sgrol sgrol ma //
T02D1706:66b-45: bsgom pa bzlas pa rtag tu bya //
T02D1706:66b-46: dur khrod dam ni shing gcig gam //
T02D1706:66b-47: ri yi rtse mo sa phug khyim //
T02D1706:66b-50: rgyal po'i khab tu'am rtags gcig drung //
T02D1706:66b-51: phyi yi nags tshal shi ba'i gnas //
T02D1706:67a-1: mtsho dang ni chu mig rnams //
T02D1706:67a-2: ma mo'i gnas su nges par gnas //
T02D1706:67a-3: gang yang lon med grub pa'o //
T02D1706:67a-4: thogs med rtag tu sbyang bar bya //
T02D1706:67a-5: rnal 'byor de yis sgom pa rnams //
T02D1706:67a-6: gnas kyi sde yi rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1706:67a-7: rigs kyi rdo rje skyes pa'ang rung //
T02D1706:67a-8: ye shes rdo rje'i sgom pa'ang //
T02D1706:67a-9: rim pa sde yi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1706:67a-10: bla yi sde yi rjes rim pa'o //
T02D1706:67a-11: byang chub sems ni rab brtan bya //
T02D1706:67a-12: thams cad shin tu rab brtan blo //
T02D1706:67a-13: bden min rnam par rtog pa bral //
T02D1706:67a-14: yul chos rnam par spang bar bya //
T02D1706:67a-15: lus dang ngag yid sde yis ni //
T02D1706:67a-16: myur du de gsung dngos grub thob //
T02D1706:67a-17: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa //
T02D1706:67a-18: aom yig dag ni rnam par bsgom //
T02D1706:67a-19: spyi bo'i steng du song bar lta //
T02D1706:67a-20: bdud rtsi lnga yi char phab bo //
T02D1706:67a-21: ji ltar rnal 'byor rab tu bya //
T02D1706:67a-22: au pa ha ra dbul bar bya //
T02D1706:67a-24: skad cig tsam gyis gzi brjid 'grub //
T02D1706:67a-25: rnal 'byor thams cad sel bar byed //
T02D1706:67a-26: ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i gtam //
T02D1706:67a-27: sgrol ma'i gzugs ni gzugs chen mo //
T02D1706:67a-28: bsgoms shig de nyid yang dag don //
T02D1706:67a-29: bam yig khar song bsgom par bya //
T02D1706:67a-30: aom ni lce yi rtse mor blta //
T02D1706:67a-31: thams cad bza' ba'i gnas yin cing //
T02D1706:67a-32: yid bzhin nor bu mchog bzhin no //
T02D1706:67a-33: zhi ba thams cad sdug bsngal sel //
T02D1706:67a-34: ye shes sems dpa' rab bsgom bya //
T02D1706:67a-36: byang chub sems dpa' grags pa che //
T02D1706:67a-37: gnas gsum grub pa thob par 'gyur //
T02D1706:67a-38: sgrol ma'i lha mo rnal 'byor ldan //
T02D1706:67a-39: rdo rje gsang rgyud bla med du //
T02D1706:67a-40: rdo rje ldan mas bris pa'o //
T02D1706:67a-42: 'phags ma gnas kyi dbang phyug ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D1706:67a-43: rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyud las mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje ldan mas phyung ba rdzogs so /
T02D1706:67a-46: // / thugs rje chen pos dbang ldan gsum bskur ba'i grub
T02D1706:67a-47: thob wa ni ta bha dra'i slob ma sam gha
T02D1706:67a-49: bod kyi lo ts'a ba 'jam dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rjes bsgyur ba'o //
T02D1706:67a-51: pandi ta ba ra he ta /
